<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashnode">HashNode</a> is an entry in an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/outlinedhashtree">OutlinedHashTree</a>, holding a hash value and a collection of Successors (other HashNodes).

If a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashnode">HashNode</a> has a positive terminal value (Terminals &gt; 0), it signifies the end of a hash sequence with that occurrence count.

Definition at line 32 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/cgdata/outlinedhashtree-h">OutlinedHashTree.h</a>.
